sourcesContent:
export const upgradematerialsGen = {
  btnGeneral: `Details`,
  btnList: `Find`,
  btnTable: `Upgrades`,
}

export const upgradematerials = [
  {
    id: 1,
    title: `Adamantite Scrap`,
    description: `Adamantite ore with a dull, silvery shine.

    Base material commonly used in advanced Prosthetic Tool Upgrades.
    
    Adamantite can only be mined in the oldest parts of Ashina. Ancient rock and soil is said to attract the grace of gods, perhaps lending this metal its supple strength.`,
    usage: [
      { id: 1, upgrade: `Golden Vortex`, qty: 2, },
      { id: 2, upgrade: `Sparking Axe`, qty: 2, },
      { id: 3, upgrade: `Leaping Flame`, qty: 2, },
      { id: 4, upgrade: `Sen Throw`, qty: 2, },
      { id: 5, upgrade: `Piercing Sabimaru`, qty: 4, },
      { id: 6, upgrade: `Purple Fume Spark`, qty: 2, },
      { id: 7, upgrade: `Lazulite Shuriken `, qty: 5, },
      { id: 8, upgrade: `Lazulite Sabimaru`, qty: 4, },
      { id: 9, upgrade: `Lazulite Axe`, qty: 5, },
    ],
    obtain: [
      { id: 1, location: `Ashina Castle - `, find: `Dropped by purple ninja near Antechamber Idol (Late-Game)` },
      { id: 2, location: `Ashina Depths - Hidden Forest`, find: `1 can be found inside the temple of the Mist Noble.` },
      { id: 3, location: `Ashina Depths - Mibu Village`, find: `Sold by the Merchant Exiled Memorial Mob for 600 Sen` },
      { id: 4, location: `Ashina Depths - Mibu Village`, find: `From the shrine with the sake, grapple up and go along the wall to pick up 1.` },
      { id: 5, location: `Ashina Depths - Mibu Village`, find: `1 can be found behind the structure and outside of the house where the drinking NPC is found.` },
      { id: 6, location: `Ashina Depths - Mibu Village`, find: `Travel to the Mibu Village idol and leave the idol toward the village and lake. Once at the lake jump in and swim toward the right side where the dock is located - you can grapple up here. Once grappled up, go straight ahead and down into the ravine. You'll find the item along with a Pine Resin Ember which is located on the house at the end of the ravine.` },
      { id: 7, location: `Fountainhead Palace - `, find: `from the large courtyard, you can acquire 1 inside the building where there is a flute player and beasts.` },
      { id: 8, location: `Fountainhead Palace - `, find: `1 can be acquired inside the house where a 1x masked guard with a polearm, and a red-robbed noble can be found.` },
      { id: 9, location: `Fountainhead Palace - `, find: `there is 1 lying around the area where the Sakura Bull of the Palace is encountered.` },
      { id: 10, location: `Fountainhead Palace - `, find: `dive underneath the building where the woman standing on a rooftop is found, where you'll find 1 on the roof of a half-sunken building; and 1 more can be acquired inside the cave of the Great Carp - but beware to head inside the cave once the Great Carp is dead.` },
    ],
    farm: [
      { id: 1, enemy: `Monk Spear Adepts` },
      { id: 2, enemy: `Okami Warriors` },
      { id: 3, enemy: `Ministry Red Guard Swordsman` },
    ],
    img: `adamantite-scrap.webp`
  },
  {
    id: 1,
    title: `Adamantite Scrap`,
    description: `Adamantite ore with a dull, silvery shine.

    Base material commonly used in advanced Prosthetic Tool Upgrades.
    
    Adamantite can only be mined in the oldest parts of Ashina. Ancient rock and soil is said to attract the grace of gods, perhaps lending this metal its supple strength.`,
    usage: [
      { id: 1, upgrade: `Golden Vortex`, qty: 2, },
      { id: 2, upgrade: `Sparking Axe`, qty: 2, },
      { id: 3, upgrade: `Leaping Flame`, qty: 2, },
      { id: 4, upgrade: `Sen Throw`, qty: 2, },
      { id: 5, upgrade: `Piercing Sabimaru`, qty: 4, },
      { id: 6, upgrade: `Purple Fume Spark`, qty: 2, },
      { id: 7, upgrade: `Lazulite Shuriken `, qty: 5, },
      { id: 8, upgrade: `Lazulite Sabimaru`, qty: 4, },
      { id: 9, upgrade: `Lazulite Axe`, qty: 5, },
    ],
    obtain: [
      { id: 1, location: `Ashina Castle - `, find: `Dropped by purple ninja near Antechamber Idol (Late-Game)` },
      { id: 2, location: `Ashina Depths - Hidden Forest`, find: `1 can be found inside the temple of the Mist Noble.` },
      { id: 3, location: `Ashina Depths - Mibu Village`, find: `Sold by the Merchant Exiled Memorial Mob for 600 Sen` },
      { id: 4, location: `Ashina Depths - Mibu Village`, find: `From the shrine with the sake, grapple up and go along the wall to pick up 1.` },
      { id: 5, location: `Ashina Depths - Mibu Village`, find: `1 can be found behind the structure and outside of the house where the drinking NPC is found.` },
      { id: 6, location: `Ashina Depths - Mibu Village`, find: `Travel to the Mibu Village idol and leave the idol toward the village and lake. Once at the lake jump in and swim toward the right side where the dock is located - you can grapple up here. Once grappled up, go straight ahead and down into the ravine. You'll find the item along with a Pine Resin Ember which is located on the house at the end of the ravine.` },
      { id: 7, location: `Fountainhead Palace - `, find: `from the large courtyard, you can acquire 1 inside the building where there is a flute player and beasts.` },
      { id: 8, location: `Fountainhead Palace - `, find: `1 can be acquired inside the house where a 1x masked guard with a polearm, and a red-robbed noble can be found.` },
      { id: 9, location: `Fountainhead Palace - `, find: `there is 1 lying around the area where the Sakura Bull of the Palace is encountered.` },
      { id: 10, location: `Fountainhead Palace - `, find: `dive underneath the building where the woman standing on a rooftop is found, where you'll find 1 on the roof of a half-sunken building; and 1 more can be acquired inside the cave of the Great Carp - but beware to head inside the cave once the Great Carp is dead.` },
    ],
    farm: [
      { id: 1, enemy: `Monk Spear Adepts` },
      { id: 2, enemy: `Okami Warriors` },
      { id: 3, enemy: `Ministry Red Guard Swordsman` },
    ],
    img: `adamantite-scrap.webp`
  },
  {
    id: 1,
    title: `Adamantite Scrap`,
    description: `Adamantite ore with a dull, silvery shine.

    Base material commonly used in advanced Prosthetic Tool Upgrades.
    
    Adamantite can only be mined in the oldest parts of Ashina. Ancient rock and soil is said to attract the grace of gods, perhaps lending this metal its supple strength.`,
    usage: [
      { id: 1, upgrade: `Golden Vortex`, qty: 2, },
      { id: 2, upgrade: `Sparking Axe`, qty: 2, },
      { id: 3, upgrade: `Leaping Flame`, qty: 2, },
      { id: 4, upgrade: `Sen Throw`, qty: 2, },
      { id: 5, upgrade: `Piercing Sabimaru`, qty: 4, },
      { id: 6, upgrade: `Purple Fume Spark`, qty: 2, },
      { id: 7, upgrade: `Lazulite Shuriken `, qty: 5, },
      { id: 8, upgrade: `Lazulite Sabimaru`, qty: 4, },
      { id: 9, upgrade: `Lazulite Axe`, qty: 5, },
    ],
    obtain: [
      { id: 1, location: `Ashina Castle - `, find: `Dropped by purple ninja near Antechamber Idol (Late-Game)` },
      { id: 2, location: `Ashina Depths - Hidden Forest`, find: `1 can be found inside the temple of the Mist Noble.` },
      { id: 3, location: `Ashina Depths - Mibu Village`, find: `Sold by the Merchant Exiled Memorial Mob for 600 Sen` },
      { id: 4, location: `Ashina Depths - Mibu Village`, find: `From the shrine with the sake, grapple up and go along the wall to pick up 1.` },
      { id: 5, location: `Ashina Depths - Mibu Village`, find: `1 can be found behind the structure and outside of the house where the drinking NPC is found.` },
      { id: 6, location: `Ashina Depths - Mibu Village`, find: `Travel to the Mibu Village idol and leave the idol toward the village and lake. Once at the lake jump in and swim toward the right side where the dock is located - you can grapple up here. Once grappled up, go straight ahead and down into the ravine. You'll find the item along with a Pine Resin Ember which is located on the house at the end of the ravine.` },
      { id: 7, location: `Fountainhead Palace - `, find: `from the large courtyard, you can acquire 1 inside the building where there is a flute player and beasts.` },
      { id: 8, location: `Fountainhead Palace - `, find: `1 can be acquired inside the house where a 1x masked guard with a polearm, and a red-robbed noble can be found.` },
      { id: 9, location: `Fountainhead Palace - `, find: `there is 1 lying around the area where the Sakura Bull of the Palace is encountered.` },
      { id: 10, location: `Fountainhead Palace - `, find: `dive underneath the building where the woman standing on a rooftop is found, where you'll find 1 on the roof of a half-sunken building; and 1 more can be acquired inside the cave of the Great Carp - but beware to head inside the cave once the Great Carp is dead.` },
    ],
    farm: [
      { id: 1, enemy: `Monk Spear Adepts` },
      { id: 2, enemy: `Okami Warriors` },
      { id: 3, enemy: `Ministry Red Guard Swordsman` },
    ],
    img: `adamantite-scrap.webp`
  },
]
